A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi was a fantastic addition to the Star Wars universe and by far the most shocking since empire strikes back.
I understand if some people my not like the twist that takes place as they might feel in renders some of force awakens pointless. But for me it actually strengthens kylo rend character so much it was fantastic. And it was the last thing I expected.
Greatest performance by Marc Hamil as Luke Skywalkwr. Emotional and gritty. Didn't expect it to be so.
A bit long for some in the casino scene but I loved it as it extends the universe. 
The use of the force in New was is great. We can't just stick to what the force was on the 80s.

I understand why some hate it. But for me I think it went such a different way it shocked people beyond comfort.

Loved it!

3rd joint favourite Star Wars with Return of jedi. After Empire strikes back and New Hope.
